title: Arrows against the wind
creator_credit: Tracey Groome, SBS-TV and A Land Beyond Production
brief_description: Describes the culture and traditional way of life of the indigenous peoples of West Papua (Irian Jaya), and the social, political and environmental upheaval they have endured since the beginning of Indonesian rule in 1963. Outlines their continuing struggle for social justice and self-determination.
